wikitext.*:
'''Eastern Eriador''' was a name used for the wild lands in the east of [[Eriador]] on the western side of the [[Misty Mountains]]. The [[Hobbitish|Hobbit]] name ''Wilderland'' for the lands on the eastern side of the Misty Mountains, called [[Rhovanion]] in [[Sindarin]], was often used to include Eastern Eriador.<ref>{{HM|UI}}, entry ''Wilderland'', p. 14</ref>

==See also==
*[[Edge of the Wild]], possibly its western border.
